channel.title: Ancients, and Safe zone
channel.description:
How do I get it so that ancients will work on my server... I'm coding my own, and it doesn't work correctly...
Also, how do I make safe zones. The server source I am using makes it so you can Pk anywhere, which is kind of unfair... So any help?
